intro: Pseudophegopteris yigongensis, commonly known as the Yigong fern, is a rare and unique species of fern found primarily in the mountainous regions of China. The plant thrives in cool, moist environments, typically at high altitudes where it forms dense, low-growing colonies. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Pseudophegopteris yigongensis is considered a valuable subject for botanical research and conservation efforts.
